title: Sammy Gravano
summary: Salvatore "Sammy the Bull" Gravano (born March 12, 1945) is an American former gangster who became underboss of the Gambino crime family. Gravano played a major role in prosecuting John Gotti, the crime family's boss, by agreeing to testify as a government witness against him and other mobsters in a deal in which he confessed to involvement in 19 murders.[2]
